alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; McClain; Pontotoc; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 10:29AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Garvin, southern Seminole, southeastern Cleveland, northwestern Pontotoc, Pottawatomie and southeastern McClain Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1029 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Earlsboro to near Macomb to 6 miles north of Rosedale. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Ada, Seminole, Tecumseh, Pink, Stratford, Konawa, Byng, Maud, Earlsboro, Bowlegs, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Francis, Byars, St. Louis, Etowah, Rosedale and Brooksville. This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 192. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cleveland; Garvin; McClain; Pontotoc; Pottawatomie; Seminole
